nodes.name: create

devdoc.details: Contract for upgradeable applications. It handles the creation of proxies.

create(string,string,address,bytes).details: Creates a new proxy for the given contract and forwards a function call to it. This is useful to initialize the proxied contract.

params.data: Data to send as msg.data to the corresponding implementation to initialize the proxied contract. It should include the signature and the parameters of the function to be called, as described in https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.4.24/abi-spec.html#function-selector-and-argument-encoding. This parameter is optional, if no data is given the initialization call to proxied contract will be skipped.
params.packageName: Name of the package where the contract is contained.

getImplementation(string,string).details: Returns the implementation address for a given contract name, provided by the `ImplementationProvider`.

params.packageName: Name of the package where the contract is contained.

getImplementation(string,string).return: Address where the contract is implemented.

getPackage(string).details: Returns information on a package given its name.

params.packageName: Name of the package to be queried.

getPackage(string).return: A tuple with the package address and pinned version given a package name, or zero if not set

getProvider(string).details: Returns the provider for a given package name, or zero if not set.

params.packageName: Name of the package to be retrieved.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setPackage(string,address,uint64[3]).details: Sets a package in a specific version as a dependency for this application. Requires the version to be present in the package.

params.package: Address of the package to register.
params.packageName: Name of the package to set or overwrite.
params.version: Version of the package to use in this application.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unsetPackage(string).details: Unsets a package given its name. Reverts if the package is not set in the application.

params.packageName: Name of the package to remove.

devdoc.title: App

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
